Title: He's Just Not That Into You
movie description: ['Description', 'Four men and five women in Baltimore struggle to keep their love lives alive. Each one of them experiences heartbreak and tries to deal with the complexities of relationships.']

Title: Eagle Eye
movie description: ['Description', 'Jerry Shaw and Rachel Holloman receive a mysterious call from an unknown woman. The woman controls their every move and asks them to carry out a dangerous mission planned by a terrorist outfit.']

Title: Along Came Polly
movie description: ['Description', 'Reuben finds his life taking a different turn when he reconnects and falls in love with his old classmate, Polly. Chaos ensues when his ex-wife, Lisa, returns to reconcile with him.']

Title: Flushed Away
movie description: ['Description', 'Roddy, a rat, lives a luxurious lifestyle in a furnished flat. However, life has other plans for him after he gets flushed from a toilet into the sewers of London, where a new beginning awaits him.']

Title: Scary Movie 4
movie description: ['Description', 'While working as caretaker for an old woman, Cindy meets the ghost of a boy. She also falls in love with the neighbour, Tom. When giant tripods invade the Earth, Cindy leaves to find some answers.']

Title: Dante's Peak
movie description: ['Description', "Volcanologist Dalton travels to Dante's peak and discovers that a raging volcano is about to erupt. He tries to convince the town's unbelieving populace to be alert."]

Title: Brokeback Mountain
movie description: ['Description', 'Ennis and Jack are two shepherds who develop a sexual and emotional relationship. Their relationship becomes complicated when both of them get married to their respective girlfriends.']

Title: Patriot Games
movie description: ['Description', "Ex-CIA agent Jack Ryan impedes an attack by the IRA in London and ends up slaying one of the terrorists. However, the dead man's brother soon escapes and vows revenge against Jack."]

Title: Flubber
movie description: ['Description', 'Philip tries his best to create a new source of energy which will save his college from being shut down. In the process, he ends up creating a rubber-like substance, which helps objects jump higher.']

Title: Baywatch
movie description: ['Description', 'Lifeguard Mitch Buchannon and his team discover a drug racket involving businesswoman Victoria Leeds and decide to unearth the truth and bring the perpetrators to justice.']

Title: Double Jeopardy
movie description: ['Description', "A woman arrested for her husband's murder is sentenced to six years imprisonment. After her release, she sets out to find her son and the truth about the murder as she suspects foul play."]

Title: War Horse
movie description: ['Description', 'Albert and his horse Joey are inseparable. However, when Joey is sold off to the British cavalry, Albert follows him in the hope of reuniting with his best friend.']

Title: Paranormal Activity 2
movie description: ['Description', 'Family man Daniel installs security cameras in his new house after a break-in. But what follows over the next few days leads his daughter to conclude that their house may be haunted.']

Title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
movie description: ['Description', 'Benjamin is challenged by his co-workers to make a woman fall in love with him. On the other hand, Andie has to write an article on how to lose a man in 10 days.']

Title: Alien vs. Predator
movie description: ['Description', 'A team of archaeologists investigate a suspicious spot in Antarctica and discover an alien species. Their life is further endangered when they are caught between and hunted by aliens and predators.']

Title: Hero
movie description: ['Description', 'A policeman decides to narrate his heroics of killing three assassins called Long Sky, Flying Snow and Broken Sword, to Qin, the King of China.']

Title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
movie description: ['Description', 'Andy, a forty-year-old virgin, works at an electronics store and is happy with his life. When his co-workers learn about his celibacy, they decide to help him lose his virginity.']

Title: Lee Daniels' The Butler
movie description: ['Description', 'Significant events in America like the Civil Rights Movement and the Vietnam War affect the life of a butler, Cecil, who, during his tenure, served eight presidents at the White House.']

Title: The Haunting
movie description: ['Description', 'Dr Marrow enlists Theo, Luke and Nell for a study of sleep disorders at the Hill House. As soon as the terrifying truth about the mansion is revealed, everyone is found fighting for their lives.']

Title: The Descendants
movie description: ['Description', 'A father unites with his two daughters, after his wife goes into a coma. Together they try to find the man she was seeing before the accident.']

Title: The A-Team
movie description: ['Description', 'After succeeding on a special mission in Iraq, four American soldiers may face a court martial for losing important evidence. Six months later, they get a chance to clear their names.']

Title: Tootsie
movie description: ['Description', 'Michael Dorsey, who is a brilliant but unemployed actor, disguises himself as a woman named Dorsey for a drama. His life reaches a hilarious climax when he falls in love with his co-star, Julie.']

Title: In the Line of Fire
movie description: ['Description', "Frank, a Secret Service agent, fails to protect Kennedy from an assassination attempt. Soon enough, he gets a chance at redemption when another president's life is under threat."]

Title: Analyze This
movie description: ['Description', "Ben Sobol, a psychiatrist, faces several problems in his personal life. One day, when he crashes into a mob boss' car, the dangerous criminal pays him a visit and shares his inner conflicts with him."]

Title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
movie description: ['Description', "Michael Bryce, a protection agent, is tasked with protecting Darius Kincaid, one of the world's most famous assassins. The two must then set aside their differences to tackle several dangerous events."]

Title: Looper
movie description: ['Description', 'In the near future, the mob sends their victims back in time to get them executed by the loopers. Joe, one such looper, finds himself to be the victim of his own actions.']

Title: Serial (Bad) Weddings
movie description: ['Description', 'A Catholic couple from France has their life turned upside down when their four daughters marry men from different races and religions.']

Title: Ip Man 4: The Finale
movie description: ['Description', 'Ip Man and his son encounter racial discrimination after travelling to the United States to seek a better life.']

Title: Dr. Dolittle 2
movie description: ['Description', 'Dr Dolittle must help Archie, a bear, win over his lady-love. Whilst doing so, he must also protect a forest from encroachment and thereby save the habitat of the animals.']

Title: The Italian Job
movie description: ['Description', 'John Bridger and Charlie Croker assemble a team to steal gold bars from a vault in Venice, but one of their team members betrays them. After many years, Charlie meticulously plans another heist.']

Title: The Bucket List
movie description: ['Description', 'Two terminally ill men left with only six months to live, decide to explore life and make a bucket list comprising all the things they have never tried before.']

Title: Sleeping with the Enemy
movie description: ['Description', "A woman is forced to change her looks and her identity, all to escape the most dangerous man she's ever known, her husband."]

Title: Cowboys & Aliens
movie description: ['Description', "Jake Lonergan enters the town of Absolution with no memory of how he turned up in the desert. However, he becomes the townspeople's only hope when aliens suddenly attack."]

Title: The Mule
movie description: ['Description', 'Due to financial issues, horticulturist Earl Stone becomes a courier for a drug cartel. Slowly, he grows closer to his estranged family, but his illegal activities threaten much more than his life.']

Title: George of the Jungle
movie description: ['Description', 'Baby George is the lone survivor of a plane crash and is raised by a wise gorilla in the jungle. One day, he saves Ursula and moves from his sweet jungle life in Africa to San Francisco.']

Title: Evan Almighty
movie description: ['Description', 'When God warns him about an enormous flood, Evan Baxter, a congressman, is forced to build an ark to save all the animals and humans.']

Title: Amélie
movie description: ['Description', 'Despite being caught in her imaginative world, Amelie, a young waitress, decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey where she finds true love.']

Title: Identity Thief
movie description: ['Description', 'Sandy is shocked to learn that someone has stolen his identity and has been living it up in Florida. When he leaves his home and job to find the culprit, he also has to deal with bounty hunters.']

Title: The Nutcracker and the Four Realms
movie description: ['Description', 'On Christmas Eve, Clara realises that before dying, her mother left her with an inheritance to a magical world of fairies and toy soldiers that are alive. She holds the key to the fate of this world.']

Title: Big Momma's House
movie description: ['Description', 'FBI agent Malcolm specialises in disguising himself beyond recognition. This time, he transforms into an old lady to get hold of a bank robber who will visit his ex-girlfriend.']

Title: In Time
movie description: ['Description', 'In a future where people stop ageing after 25 and need to buy time to live, the rich become immortal while others cease to exist. So, Will is on the run with a hostage in a desperate bid to survive.']

Title: Operation Mekong
movie description: ['Description', "The Chinese government launches a daring operation to arrest a violent drug cartel following the discovery of thirteen Chinese crew members' bodies on two ships sailing through the Mekong River."]

Title: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues
movie description: ['Description', "A celebrated news anchor from San Diego, post getting fired by his boss, is hired by New York's first 24-hour news channel where he takes the channel by storm through his new style of news coverage."]

Title: Creed
movie description: ['Description', "Adonis Johnson, the son of heavyweight champion Apollo Creed, embraces his legacy as a boxer and seeks mentorship from Rocky Balboa, his father's old friend and rival."]

Title: Gemini Man
movie description: ['Description', 'Henry is an ageing assassin who finds himself being chased by someone with the ability to predict his moves. He soon discovers that the person is his clone and sets out to discover his origin.']

Title: The Girl on the Train
movie description: ['Description', 'Rachel, a divorcee, idealises Scott and Megan, a young couple who live next to her ex-husband. However, when Megan suddenly goes missing, Rachel gets dragged into the ensuing investigation.']
